dcterms:description: The DroneVehicle dataset contains 56,878 samples taken by drones, divided between half RGB and half infrared images. The data includes annotations with oriented bounding boxes, labeled with five different categories: car, truck, bus, van, and freight car. The images are resized to 256 Ã— 256 for training and validation.
dcterms:title: DroneVehicle
